title: Smart data models - BuildingSpace schema
description: An entity used to define the physical spaces of the building. A building space contains devices or building objects.

type.description: Property. It must be equal to `BuildingSpace`.

airVolume.description: Property. Air Volume of this building space. Measured in m3.

bounds.description: Property. Bounds of this building space represented as a box in 3D.

buildingSpaceKind.description: Property. Detailed type of the Building Space.

isSpaceOfBuilding.description: Relationship. A building represents a structure that provides shelter for its occupants or contents and stands in one place. The building is also used to provide a basic element within the spatial structure hierarchy for the components of a building project (together with site, storey, and space). (Building)

isSpaceOfBuildingSpace.description: Relationship. An entity used to define the physical spaces of the building. A building space contains devices or building objects. (BuildingSpace)
